id: #adding medium ingredients not found in minimal media (original source of model medium) but in YPD according to https://view.officeapps.live.com/op/view.aspx?src=https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fmaranasgroup%2FiRhto_memote%2Fmaster%2Fsupplementary_files%2FSupplementary%2520Materials%25201.xlsx&wdOrigin=BROWSELINK
# added cobalt as cofactor for enzymes despite not being stated as medium component because it was found in the original GSM model medium

# 2025-05-30: updated bounds to match scRBA's original version; corroborated by yeast9 (https://github.com/SysBioChalmers/yeast-GEM/blob/main/model/yeast-GEM.xlsx). All original values for these bounds were 0.
## Present in yeast9; but should keep off to ensure acetaldehyde and ethanol can't be secreted

## turn off to avoid cycles (more serious than most cycles since they're not just transport reactions)
